name: Red Panda Math Run
description:
Run, jump, and sploot in this cute endless runner as you avoid obstacles and answer math problems! Pick a specific category of questions, or All if you want a variety. Available categories are:

  • Addition (easy or hard)
  • Subtraction (easy or hard)
  • Multiplication
  • Division
  • Recognize multiples
  • Compare numbers
  • Prime numbers
